title: Relooted: New video game sees Africans fantasise about taking back treasures from Europe's museums
description: Imagine it is 2099 and a historic treaty to return African artefacts is falling apart.
content:
Imagine it is 2099 and the Transatlantic Returns Treaty is falling apart as Western museums find ways to wriggle out of promises to return stolen African treasures.
Fed up with the trickery, artefacts expert Prof Grace decides to take matters into he... [6055 chars]

title: Munich Security Conference: Trump’s world order hangs over Europe
description: Leaders gather this week for the Munich Security Conference, with European security at a crossroads.
content:
It is one year since US Vice-President JD Vance delivered a bombshell speech at the Munich Security Conference, castigating Europe for its policies on migration and free speech, and claiming the greatest threat the continent faces comes from within.
... [5616 chars]

title: Why food fraud persists, even with improving tech
description: Even with sophisticated technology it is still difficult to detect fake foods.
content:
Food crime mostly goes unreported, so it's difficult to grasp its scale.
It can include diluting or substituting ingredients, altering documents, or going through unapproved processes.
One 2025 estimate, external is that food crime costs the global e... [5030 chars]

title: Lower-income families face 137-year wait for living standards to double, says UK thinktank
description: Two decades of weak pay growth have left poorer households stuck, Resolution Foundation says, fuelling political unease
content:
It would take 137 years for lower-income families in the UK to see their living standards double at the current rate of growth, according to a thinktank.
A two-decade stagnation in disposable incomes has created a “mood of unease” across the country,... [2697 chars]

title: Keir Starmer says he is ‘not prepared to walk away’ after call for resignation
description: PM survives day of high tension after Scots Labour leader Anas Sarwar calls for him to step down amid Peter Mandelson row
content:
Keir Starmer has seen off an immediate challenge to his position from Labour’s leader in Scotland, telling his MPs he was “not prepared to walk away” from power and plunge the country into chaos.
But the prime minister emerged badly damaged from a tu... [7158 chars]
